trans-unit.source: For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Weitere Informationen zu drucken, finden Sie unter der <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> Namespace (Übersicht).

trans-unit.source: A3 extra paper (322 mm by 445 mm).
A3 extra transverse paper (322 mm by 445 mm).
A3 rotated paper (420 mm by 297 mm).
A3 transverse paper (297 mm by 420 mm).
A4 extra paper (236 mm by 322 mm).
This value is specific to the PostScript driver and is used only by Linotronic printers to help save paper.
trans-unit.target: Dies ist ein für den PostScript-Treiber spezifischer Wert, der nur von Linotronic-Druckern verwendet wird, um dabei zu helfen, Papier zu sparen.

trans-unit.source: A4 plus paper (210 mm by 330 mm).
A4 rotated paper (297 mm by 210 mm).
Requires Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, or later.
trans-unit.target: Erfordert Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0 oder höher.

trans-unit.source: A4 small paper (210 mm by 297 mm).
A4 transverse paper (210 mm by 297 mm).
A5 extra paper (174 mm by 235 mm).
A5 rotated paper (210 mm by 148 mm).
Requires Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, or later.
trans-unit.target: Erfordert Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0 oder höher.

trans-unit.source: A5 transverse paper (148 mm by 210 mm).
Requires Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, or later.
trans-unit.target: Erfordert Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0 oder höher.

trans-unit.source: A6 rotated paper (148 mm by 105 mm).
Requires Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, or later.
trans-unit.target: Erfordert Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0 oder höher.

trans-unit.source: JIS B4 rotated paper (364 mm by 257 mm).
Requires Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, or later.
trans-unit.target: Erfordert Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0 oder höher.

trans-unit.source: ISO B5 extra paper (201 mm by 276 mm).
JIS B5 rotated paper (257 mm by 182 mm).
Requires Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, or later.
trans-unit.target: Erfordert Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0 oder höher.

trans-unit.source: JIS B5 transverse paper (182 mm by 257 mm).
JIS B6 paper (128 mm by 182 mm).
Requires Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, or later.
trans-unit.target: Erfordert Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0 oder höher.

trans-unit.source: JIS B6 rotated paper (182 mm by 128 mm).
Requires Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, or later.
trans-unit.target: Erfordert Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0 oder höher.

trans-unit.source: The paper size is defined by the user.
trans-unit.target: Das Papierformat wird vom Benutzer definiert.

trans-unit.source: Japanese double postcard (200 mm by 148 mm).
Requires Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0, or later.
trans-unit.target: Erfordert Windows 98, Windows NT 4.0 oder höher.

trans-unit.source: This value is specific to the PostScript driver and is used only by Linotronic printers in order to conserve paper.
